name: STRANDED (itch) (TE4M 2.0)
description:
You’re all alone in darkness. It’s hard to see what’s ahead and whether you’ll even make it back alive.  

Keeping calm to pace your breath, knowing its only a matter of time before it runs out. 

When and where will you find the next oxygen tank! Your vital life support!  

Perhaps if you purge your tank a little bit to boost you to find it faster.  

But what if you’re wrong!? will you have enough to finish to get out alive!?

A TE4M 2.0 production brings you this isolating thriller that is….

STRANDED

This game is a single player, 2D space adventure game built in Unity Engine 4. It is based in deep space, where a lone survivor of a shipwreck with limited oxygen must do what it takes to survive. 

The survivor must first navigate open space to reach a nearby space station, which is also devastated and lost, to find a part of the ship required to fix his own, however there are many obstacles in the way.

Mechanics involve two gravity states to navigate through:

100% Gravity

A & D : Left and Right Movement
Left Shift : Run
Spacebar : Jump
F : Interact

0% Gravity:

W & S : Up and down movement relative to player
A & D : Rotate player counterclockwise and clockwise
Spacebar/Left Mouse Click : Oxygen burst
F : Interact

TE4M 2.0 is a small group of MDS students making their way to become you're favourite game developers!
Watch this space for more games or check out our individual work at:
